item.title: Trump's plan to tackle inflation could cause price spikes, experts say
item.description: Although Donald Trump vows to bring U.S. prices down "very quickly," some economists say his policies could rekindle inflation. Here's what to know.

item.title: Here's what some Olympic athletes get instead of cash prizes
item.description: Cash, cars and even cows are just a few ways some nations reward their medal-winning Olympic athletes.

item.title: Microsoft users around the world report widespread outages
item.description: Banks, airlines, broadcasters and health systems in countries around the world reported widespread outages Friday in relation to Microsoft's 365 apps.

item.title: Trump delivers 2024 Republican National Convention speech
item.description: Former President Donald Trump closed Day 4 of the 2024 Republican National Convention with a speech, his first major public remarks since the assassination attempt at a Pennsylvania campaign rally. Watch his full remarks.

item.title: Trump accepts GOP nomination with lengthy RNC speech, his first since shooting
item.description: "I am not supposed to be here tonight," former President Donald Trump said. "I stand before you in this arena only by the grace of almighty God."

item.title: Fact check of Trump, others on Day 4 of the Republican National Convention
item.description: CBS News is fact checking statements made by GOP speakers on the fourth and final night of the 2024 RNC, when Donald Trump addresses the convention.

item.title: Trump on assassination attempt: "I'm not supposed to be here"
item.description: Former President Donald Trump publicly recounted the assassination attempt for the first time during a speech at the Republican National Convention.

item.title: Houthis claim drone strike on Tel Aviv that Israel says killed 1
item.description: Israel's military says a drone attack launched from Yemen has killed 1 person in Tel Aviv and left at least 8 others wounded.

item.title: Watch: Trump's 2024 RNC entrance
item.description: Former President Donald Trump made a dramatic entrance on the final night of the 2024 Republican National Convention, walking on stage with his last name behind him in bright lights.

item.title: Trump shooting investigations focus on motive, security failures
item.description: The U.S. Secret Service is facing mounting questions about the security flaws that allowed the shooter to fire from a rooftop near the rally.

item.title: Trump pays tribute to Pennsylvania firefighter killed in rally shooting
item.description: Former President Donald Trump placed Corey Comperatore's firefighting helmet and jacket on stage during his address at the Republican National Convention.

item.title: Detroit pastor Lorenzo Sewell speaks at the RNC
item.description: Michigan pastor Lorenzo Sewell addressed the 2024 Republican National Convention on Thursday, one month after former President Donald Trump visited his church in Detroit. "He came to the hood because he cares about average, everyday Americans," Sewell said.

item.title: Melania Trump arrives at 2024 Republican National Convention
item.description: Melania Trump made her first appearance at the 2024 Republican National Convention on Thursday night. The former first lady has been largely absent from the campaign trail this election cycle. "CBS Evening News" anchor and managing editor Norah O'Donnell leads special coverage.

item.title: 2 senior House Democrats believe Biden could leave race in days
item.description: Two senior House Democrats believe Biden could leave the 2024 presidential race within days after a pressure campaign from top Democratic lawmakers.

item.title: Climate protesters steer clear of Republican National Convention
item.description: Many protesters stayed away, but one group found a unique way to draw attention to the climate crisis during the RNC in Milwaukee.

item.title: Eric Trump speaks at RNC, recalls his father's decision to run for president in 2016
item.description: During his speech at the Republican National Convention, former President Donald Trump's son, Eric Trump, spoke about why his father decided to run for president in 2016. Eric Trump denounced the criminal investigations against his father, claiming he's being persecuted.

item.title: Hulk Hogan calls Trump a "real American hero," rips off shirt during RNC speech
item.description: Retired professional wrestler Hulk Hogan took the stage on the final night of the Republican National Convention and said former President Donald Trump is a "real American hero." He ripped off his shirt to reveal a red Trump-Vance campaign shirt.

item.title: Trump shooter searched for rally site photos, used encrypted platforms, sources say
item.description: Briefers told lawmakers they are still attempting to access three foreign encrypted platforms the gunman, Thomas Matthew Crooks, used on his cellphone, sources told CBS News.

item.title: Montana's Jon Tester calls on Biden to withdraw from presidential race
item.description: Democratic Sen. Jon Tester of Montana said President Biden should not seen another term in the White House.

item.title: Sen. Marco Rubio says Trump has been "very impressed" by RNC
item.description: Sen. Marco Rubio of Florida says former President Donald Trump has been "very impressed" by the production at the Republican National Convention. He joins CBS News to discuss Ukraine, Trump's policy to secure the U.S.-Mexico border, and more.

item.title: Democratic Sen. Jon Tester says Biden shouldn't seek reelection
item.description: Democratic Sen. Jon Tester of Montana came out against President Biden's reelection bid on Thursday night. Tester is the second Democratic senator to call on Biden to exit the 2024 race. "CBS Evening News" anchor and managing editor Norah O'Donnell leads special coverage.

item.title: Michigan senator says he gave Biden campaign his candid assessment about 2024 race
item.description: Democratic Sen. Gary Peters of Michigan says he's been talking to President Biden's campaign team and voicing his views and concerns about how close the 2024 race is, and the challenges the Democrats face to maintain control of the Senate and the White House.

item.title: Democratic Rep. Jim Costa calls on Biden to exit race
item.description: Democratic Rep. Jim Costa of California on Thursday night called on President Biden to drop out of the 2024 race. Costa is the latest member of the president's party to call for his exit. CBS News chief election and campaign correspondent Robert Costa, no relation, has the details.

item.title: Rep. Jamie Raskin urges Biden to reconsider reelection bid
item.description: President Biden's COVID-19 diagnosis has taken him off the campaign trail in yet another setback as he contends with mounting pressure to drop out of the race. On Thursday, a July 6 letter from Rep. Jamie Raskin of Maryland surfaced in which he urged the president to reconsider his reelection bid. Kadia Goba, politics reporter for Semafor, joins "America Decides" with more.

item.title: Concerns about Biden campaign donations grow amid pressure for him to drop out of 2024 race
item.description: There are concerns President Biden's reelection campaign could run out of money amid mounting pressure for him to drop out of the 2024 race. CBS News chief election and campaign correspondent Robert Costa reports.

item.title: Trump will not mention Biden by name in RNC speech, campaign's senior adviser says
item.description: Former President Donald Trump will not mention President Biden by name during his speech at the Republican National Convention on Thursday, Trump campaign senior adviser Danielle Alvarez tells Major Garrett on "America Decides." Alvarez has more on Trump's upcoming speech and his 2024 campaign.

item.title: Maternal deaths found to be highest in states with abortion restrictions
item.description: New research finds that states with strict abortion restrictions are seeing higher rates of maternal deaths. The Commonwealth Fund analyzed data from 2021 through 2022 following the overturning of Roe v. Wade and the subsequent enactment of state abortion laws. Dr. Carolyn Sufrin, associate professor of gynecology and obstetrics at Johns Hopkins School of Medicine, joins CBS News to discuss.

item.title: Milwaukee voters weigh in on 2024 presidential race
item.description: To hear what is on the minds of voters regarding the 2024 presidential election and the political rhetoric surrounding it, "CBS Evening News" anchor and managing editor Norah O'Donnell sat down with supporters of President Biden and former President Donald Trump, along with several undecided voters at a brewery in Milwaukee.

item.title: Nonprofit seeks to bridge the political divide through meaningful conversation
item.description: An initiative from the nonprofit group StoryCorps seeks to find common ground through shared stories.

item.title: Comedy icon Bob Newhart dies at 94
item.description: Legendary comedian Bob Newhart, known for his trademark deadpan delivery, has died at the age of 94.
